parsed.internal_thinking: I've placed my first settlement on a strong 6-8-11 intersection (Brick-Sheep-Wood). Now I need to place my road. I have three options: 10, 19, and 21. Node 10 leads towards a 6-8-12 spot and a 3:1 port, which is excellent for production. Node 19 leads towards a 10-11-8 spot, which is also good but slightly lower in total pips. Node 21 leads towards the desert. I'll build towards Node 10 to maximize my future production potential and get closer to that 3:1 port. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Prioritizing the 6-8-12 expansion or the 3:1 port near node 9. Need to find Wheat and Ore for the second settlement to balance the economy.
parsed.say_outloud: pointing this road towards the coast, might grab that port later if the numbers treat me well.
